UPSAuthInsertExistingProductOrPart.Title: Insert Existing
UPSAuthInsertExistingProductOrPart.Short: Adds an existing product, part or representation inside the structure.
UPSAuthInsertExistingProductOrPart.LongH:
Select one or several products as parent and then, through a search, select one of the following 3DEXPERIENCE objects to be inserted: product, part, shape or drawing.

This command is compatible with Change Execution (including with configuration).
UPSAuthReplaceByExisting.Title: Replace by Existing
UPSAuthReplaceByExisting.ShortHelp: Replaces one object or more by an existing object of the same type.
UPSAuthReplaceByExisting.LongHelp:
Select one or several objects, and then select an existing object using a search.

Except for drawings, representations are not supported.
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.Title: Replace by Latest Revision
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.ShortHelp: Replaces a product, part, or drawing with its latest revision (if any)
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.LongHelp:
This command updates your structure with the latest modification. Select one or multiple products (except the root), parts, or drawings before launching this command.

Except for drawings, representations are not supported.
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.Title: Replace by Revision
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.ShortHelp:
Updates the selected products, parts, or drawings in a structure with an existing revision.

The Replace by Revision panel displays the product structure in a flat view. Except for drawings, representations are not supported.
UPSAuthRevisionUpdate.Title: Update Revisions
UPSAuthRevisionUpdate.ShortHelp: Updates a structure with an existing revision of its products, parts, or drawings.
UPSAuthRevisionUpdate.LongHelp:
The Update Revision panel displays the product structure in a hierarchical view. In the first column, a symbol indicates if the current revision can be replaced.

Except for drawings, representations are not supported.
UPSAuthUnparent.Title: Detach
UPSAuthUnparent.ShortHelp: Detaches the selected instance from the structure.
UPSAuthUnparent.LongHelp: This command is compatible with Change Action (including with configuration).
UPSAuthReorderProduct.Title: Reorder
UPSAuthReorderProduct.ShortHelp: Reorders the children of the selected assembly.
UPSAuthReorderProduct.LongHelp:
Lets you reorganize manually or automatically the structure.

This command takes into account the saved sorting only.
UPSAuthInsertProductConfiguration.Title: Insert Existing Product Configuration
UPSAuthInsertProductConfiguration.ShortH: Adds an existing product Configuration inside the structure.
UPSAuthInsertProductConfiguration.LongHe: Select one or several products as parent and then, through a search, select one of the following <tm tmtype = 'service' tmclass = '3D'>3D</tm>EXPERIENCE objects with Configuration.
UPSAuthReplaceProductConfiguration.Title: Replace by Existing Product Configuration
UPSAuthReplaceProductConfiguration.Short: Replaces an object by an existing Configured object of the same type.
UPSAuthReplaceProductConfiguration.LongH: Select an object, and then select an existing object using a search.
UPSAuthUpdateRevOnEntireStructure.Title: Update Revisions on Entire Structure
UPSAuthUpdateRevOnEntireStructure.ShortH: Analyzes the entire structure to propose an update with the latest revision of the children in your selection. If the update is not possible, a revision creation is proposed.
UPSAuthUpdateRevOnEntireStructure.LongHe:
If the operation is confirmed, the children of the selection are updated, even if not loaded.

Except for drawings, representations are not supported.
